chat.title: üí¨ Emergency Chat
chat.inputHelper: Ask about safety procedures, evacuation routes, or emergency supplies
chat.quickQuestionsSubtitle: Tap a question to get instant help
chat.welcomeMessage: Hello! I'm here to help you with emergency information and safety guidance. How can I assist you today?
chat.recommendations: Remember to stay calm, follow official evacuation orders, and keep emergency supplies ready.

quickQuestionsList.earthquake: What should I do during an earthquake?
quickQuestionsList.hurricane: How do I prepare for a hurricane?
quickQuestionsList.supplies: What emergency supplies do I need?
quickQuestionsList.flood: What should I do if there's flooding?
quickQuestionsList.helpOthers: How can I help others during an emergency?
quickQuestionsList.warningSigns: What are the warning signs to watch for?
quickQuestionsList.communication: How do I stay in communication during emergencies?

sos.title: üö® Emergency SOS
sos.subtitle: Emergency assistance when you need it most
sos.accessRequiredMessage: We need your location to send help to you. Please enable GPS and try again.
sos.sendConfirmMessage: This will immediately alert emergency responders to your location. Proceed?
sos.emergencyRequiredMessage: SOS should only be used for real emergencies. Are you currently in danger?
sos.sendSosMessage: This will send your location to emergency services. Continue?
sos.sosSuccessMessage: Emergency services have been notified of your location. Help is on the way.
sos.sosFailedMessage: Failed to send SOS. Please try again or call emergency services directly.
sos.importantInfoMessage: Only use SOS for real emergencies. False alarms waste resources.
sos.instruction1: ‚Ä¢ Stay calm and follow emergency procedures
sos.instruction2: ‚Ä¢ Keep your phone charged and accessible
sos.instruction4: ‚Ä¢ Do not leave your location unless instructed
sos.stayCalm: Stay calm. Help is on the way.

logout.message: Are you sure you want to logout?
